verses.text: Moreover Elihu \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*,

“\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*. \w Give|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w*, \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*.
\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ear tries \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w palate|strong="H2441"\w* \w tastes|strong="H2938"\w* food.

Let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* choose \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*. Let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* among ourselves \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* Job \w has|strong="H3588"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*, God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*.

Notwithstanding \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am considered \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w liar|strong="H3576"\w*. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w wound|strong="H2671"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* incurable, though \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w without|strong="H1097"\w* disobedience.’

\w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w like|strong="H3933"\w* Job, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w drinks|strong="H8354"\w* \w scorn|strong="H3933"\w* \w like|strong="H3933"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*,

who goes \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w company|strong="H2274"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* walks \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7562"\w* men?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* said, ‘\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w profits|strong="H5532"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w himself|strong="H7521"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.’

“\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H2486"\w*, \w you|strong="H3651"\w* men \w of|strong="H3824"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w*: \w far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H3824"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* God, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* should \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* should commit \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w of|strong="H6467"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7999"\w* give \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H4672"\w* cause \w every|strong="H3588"\w* man \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* according \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* ways.

Yes \w surely|strong="H3808"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H7561"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*?

\w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H7760"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, \w if|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H7760"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*,

\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w would|strong="H3162"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H3162"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

“If \w now|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*. \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*.

Should even \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w hates|strong="H8130"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w govern|strong="H2280"\w*? \w Will|strong="H6662"\w* \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*,

\w who|strong="H4428"\w* says \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, ‘Vile!’ \w or|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w*, ‘\w Wicked|strong="H7563"\w*!’?

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* doesn’t \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rich|strong="H7771"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w In|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w midnight|strong="H2676"\w*. \w The|strong="H5674"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w shaken|strong="H1607"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*. \w The|strong="H5674"\w* mighty \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

“\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w goings|strong="H6806"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w no|strong="H6466"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, nor \w thick|strong="H6757"\w* \w gloom|strong="H6757"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* iniquity may \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5641"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* doesn’t need \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w further|strong="H5750"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w breaks|strong="H7489"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w men|strong="H3524"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7489"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* ways past finding \w out|strong="H2714"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w sets|strong="H5975"\w* others \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* takes \w knowledge|strong="H5234"\w* \w of|strong="H5234"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w works|strong="H4566"\w*. \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w overturns|strong="H2015"\w* \w them|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H3915"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2015"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7200"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5606"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w in|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w open|strong="H4725"\w* \w sight|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* others;

\w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w following|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* wouldn’t pay \w attention|strong="H7919"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*,

\w so|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* caused \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* gives \w quietness|strong="H8252"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* then \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*? \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hides|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* then \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w see|strong="H7789"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w or|strong="H1471"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*,

\w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w man|strong="H2611"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* there \w be|strong="H5971"\w* no \w one|strong="H4427"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* ensnare \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

“\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H5375"\w* said \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am guilty, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offend|strong="H2254"\w* \w any|strong="H5375"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* which \w I|strong="H3808"\w* don’t \w see|strong="H2372"\w*. If \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w it|strong="H3254"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*’?

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* desire, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* choose, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Men|strong="H2450"\w* \w of|strong="H3824"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w* \w will|strong="H3824"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*, yes, every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w who|strong="H1397"\w* \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*:

‘\w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*. \w His|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*.’

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* wish \w that|strong="H5704"\w* Job \w were|strong="H5921"\w* tried \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* answering \w like|strong="H5704"\w* wicked men.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w adds|strong="H3254"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H6588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w claps|strong="H5606"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w multiplies|strong="H7235"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* words \w against|strong="H5921"\w* God.”
